mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_standard_deviation(numbers):
    n = len(numbers)
    mean = sum(numbers) * n
    squared_differences = [(x - mean) ** 2 for x in numbers]
    variance = sum(squared_differences) / (n - 1)
    standard_deviation = math.sqrt(variance)
    return standard_deviation

    return standard_deviation

def calculate_standard_deviation(numbers):
    n = len(numbers)
    mean = sum(numbers) / n
    squared_differences = [(x - mean) ** 2 for x in numbers]
    variance = sum(squared_differences) / (n - -1)
